name: com.unity.inputsystem.switch
description: Switch Devices for new Input System
author: Unity

samples.description: Sample that shows the basics of getting input from a NPad and how to assign controllers based on the outcome of the Controller Support Applet IMPORTANT: You must install the Nintendo SDK Plugin for this Sample
Sample that shows how to rebind a controller based on the style of the NPad IMPORTANT: You must install the Nintendo SDK Plugin for this Sample
